author: mturk
msg: Refactor AprLifecycleListener by putting the logic into separate methods.
1. Do not call terminate in case initialize failed
2. Call terminate if version is below required.
3. Do not initialize SSL if APR was not initialized.

author: norman
msg: Add better logging for permanent and temporary errors on remote delivery. See JAMES-712

author: ajborley
msg: Python extension updates to deal with errors better

author: ajborley
msg: Upped the buffer size for logging messages - was hitting the 1024 limit with some web service call logging
